text: losing hopehi  i just got diagnosed with bipolar   disorder in august  and i started medication and therapy  and for the first time in my life  i have stuck with it  i have been on prozac multiple times despite my emphasis on telling my psychiatrist i hate prozac because i always wanted to kill myself more  i am   weeks into the medication and i never have considered suicide even more  i m also in nursing school and doing surprisingly well  but despite my acceptance of the amazing people i have in my life and the great qualities i do have  it s like i feel nothing but an empty entity walking on this earth  helping patients overcome their physical and mental disorders reminds me why life is worth living  but once i leave the hospital and civilization  i m left with my true suicidal depressed self  i m tired of faking it everyday  i m tired of being  strong  everyday  i m so tired of this life and who i am actually  i just want to commit but i know i will have others suffer from my death and that has helped me prevent myself from actually committing  but the idea of it just seems so right  i don t want to bring disappointment for my family  the vietnamese culture is very i accepting of mental health illnesses and i don t want my family to be bashed on  i just don t want to be here anymore  thank you for coming to my ted talk
